DESCRIPTION.message: This extension allows you to use your new tab as a notepad!

INIT_TEXT.message:
# Welcome to NEW TAB NOTE!!

Thank you for downloading NEW TAB NOTE! 🎉
NEW TAB NOTE a new tab extension for notes 📖
Click the “New Note” button in the top left to start editing!

## Example

### ■ Emphasis
*This text will be italic.*
**This text will be bold.**
*You **can** combine them.*

### ■ Lists

####  Unordered
* Item 1
* Item 2
  * Item 2a
  * Item 2b

#### Ordered
1. Item 1
2. Item 2
3. Item 3

### ■ Link
[Chrome Web Store](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/category/extensions?hl=en&)

### ■ Task Lists
- [ ] Task 1
- [X] Task 2

### ■ Blockquote
> **note**
> element is used to indicate the quotation of a large section of text from another source.

### ■ Code
```
if (isAwesome) {
  return true
}
```

CONFIRM_DELETE_NOTE.message: Are you sure you want to delete this note?

CONFIRM_DELETE_SYNCED_NOTE.message: Deleting this note will remove it from all synced devices. If needed, please back it up before deleting.

SYNC_RESUME_USE_LOCAL.message: This note differs from its content before sync was stopped. Do you want to resume syncing with the current content?

SYNC_INFO.message: When sync is on, this note is available on all devices using the same Chrome account. When sync is off, it is saved only on this device.

SYNC_QUOTA_EXCEEDED.message: Sync storage is full. Turn off sync or delete notes you do not need to free up space.

RESUME_EDIT_ALERT.message: To resume editing, please clear the filter.
